title: Ultimate Game Cards
body: I bought an ultimate game card the other day for 10 dollars since the store didnt have 10 dollar riot cards. the card said league of legends on it so i assumed it would work but it simply doesnt. is this not illegal? and is there anything i can do to get my riot points? thanks for any help anybody can offer.

replies.body:
On their website it doesn't say it works for League of Legends. 

http://imgur.com/5lpCAy1

I don't really think anyone can do anything to help you unless you find someone willing to trade an RP card for it. Sorry for your loss man.

This information is not entirely accurate... (Reminds me of the scene from Independence day when they were talking about Area 51).

Anyways, there was an issue with Ultimate Game Cards in which they printed "League of Legends" as one of the games supported by their product, when this was in-fact untrue.  We worked with this company to have all of these cards pulled from retailers to prevent further confusion.

If you have recently purchased one of these cards, and it does say "League of Legends" on it, make sure to submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) to us here in Player Support.  In this ticket, make sure to take a picture of the front and back of your specific card, and include them as attachments.

We should be able to help you out!  :D
